titles.title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act
To adjust the boundary of the Carson National Forest, New Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: 2/13/2013--Introduced. Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act - Adjusts the boundary of the Carson National Forest in New Mexico to incorporate approximately 4,990 acres of land identified as the Miranda Canyon Boundary.
